item.title: Awakening History: 21 Years in a Museum, Will It Revive?
item.description: After more than two decades on display, this historic aircraft is tested to see if it can be revived. A careful look at its condition and potential return to life.

media:content.media:title: Awakening History: 21 Years in a Museum, Will It Revive?
media:content.media:description: After more than two decades on display, this historic aircraft is tested to see if it can be revived. A careful look at its condition and potential return to life.

item.title: Bringing Back To Life Elvis Presley's Private Jet!
item.description: A legendary aircraft gets a second chance. Follow the restoration steps as Elvis Presley’s private jet is carefully brought back to life.

item.title: $1 Private Jet! *Can Jimmy Fix It Up?!*
item.description: A nearly free private jet comes with big challenges. Follow the inspection and see whether this unique aircraft can be brought back to life.

item.title: Graceland Drama: Elvis's Jet Exits!
item.description: Elvis’s famous jet is leaving its longtime home. Here’s a look at why it’s moving and what happens next for this iconic aircraft.

item.title: Unbelievable: Setting New Records in Flight!
item.description: Pushing limits and chasing performance — see how this aircraft breaks new ground with an unforgettable record-setting flight.

item.title: What Can Go Wrong in the Sierra's First Flight?!
item.description: The Sierra takes flight for the first time, but not everything goes according to plan — here’s how the crew handles every unexpected twist.

item.title: WW2 Fighter Airplane Will It Start?
item.description: Decades after its prime, this World War II fighter is put to the test. Can it still start up and take to the skies once more?

item.title: First Flight of the Cheapest 421C!
item.description: Taking to the skies for the first time! Watch how the most affordable 421C handles its maiden flight and what surprises come along the way.

item.title: Homemade P-51 Mustang's Remarkable Revival: First Start in Years!
item.description: After years of silence, a handcrafted P-51 Mustang roars back to life. Watch this remarkable revival of a true aviation classic.

item.title: I Crashed The Elvis Jet
item.description: A moment no pilot wants to experience — the story behind the Elvis Jet mishap and what happened next in its restoration journey.

item.title: Everything Broken On The 66 Year Old Airplane
item.description: Restoring an aging aircraft isn’t easy — here’s what we found when we began working on this 66-year-old plane.

item.title: Sooo... I Bought A Helicopter
item.description: A dream takes flight! Follow the journey of buying and inspecting a helicopter — from first impressions to future plans.

item.title: Visiting the World's Largest Wood Propeller Factory!
item.description: Take a rare look inside the world’s biggest wood propeller factory and see how craftsmanship keeps aviation history alive.

item.title: Diesel Truck or Private Jet for $75k?
item.description: A surprising comparison between two big-ticket purchases — a powerful diesel truck or a private jet — exploring what $75K can really get you.

item.title: Failure in the Silver Bullet
item.description: Mid-flight trouble strikes the “Silver Bullet.” Follow the tense moments as the pilot reacts fast to handle a sudden in-air failure safely.

item.title: Unbelievable Deal: Real Fighter Jet for $60K!
item.description: An aviation enthusiast lands the deal of a lifetime — a genuine fighter jet for just $60,000. Here’s how the purchase came together and what it takes to restore it.

item.title: Was Buying This Broken Wooden P51 a Mistake?��
item.description: Was Buying This Broken Wooden P51 a Mistake?��

item.title: Can a 250 mph Museum Plane Fly Again After 20 Years?
item.description: After 20 years on display, this classic aircraft faces a big question — can it return to the skies once more?

item.title: I Surprised My Friend With Free Airplane
item.description: A dream come true — watch the moment a friend receives the ultimate surprise gift: their very own airplane.

item.title: Pixar Plane Brought to Life
item.description: A real-life version of a beloved Pixar plane takes flight — see how creativity and engineering make movie magic come true.
